tickets.name: User Authentication System
tickets.description: Implement secure user login/logout functionality with JWT tokens, password hashing, and session management for the application

tickets.name: Responsive Design Implementation
tickets.description: Create mobile-first responsive design that works seamlessly across all device sizes and screen resolutions

tickets.name: Dark Mode Theme Support
tickets.description: Add comprehensive dark mode functionality with theme switching, user preferences, and system theme detection

tickets.name: Database Performance Optimization
tickets.description: Optimize database queries and implement caching strategies to improve application performance and reduce load times

tickets.name: Real-time Notifications
tickets.description: Implement WebSocket-based real-time notification system for ticket updates and status changes

tickets.name: Advanced Search and Filtering
tickets.description: Add comprehensive search functionality with filters for ticket status, assignee, priority, and date ranges
